sentences.en: All drains should be ventilated to avoid the build - up of sewer gas.
sentences.cn: 应该给所有的排水管换气以避免阴沟臭气的集聚.

sentences.en: Noxious gases had built up in the sewer.
sentences.cn: 下水道的有害气体越积越多.

sentences.en: On global building sewer uses cupreous conduit is development trend.
sentences.cn: 在全球建筑上下水道用铜水管是发展趋势.

sentences.en: Pour the swill through a sieve, or it will clog the sewer.
sentences.cn: 倒泔水时过滤一下, 否则容易堵塞下水道.

sentences.en: She became the best sewer in the factory.
sentences.cn: 她成了该厂最好的缝纫工.

sentences.en: The boy kicked a stone into the sewer.
sentences.cn: 那个男孩把一石子踢进下水道.

sentences.en: The mobile phone is in the bag, it has rested in sewer.
sentences.cn: 手机在包里, 它已经安息在下水道.

sentences.en: The opinion of sewer as a reactor is being taken into consideration.
sentences.cn: 摘要排水管道作为反应器的问题正受到越来越多的关注.

sentences.en: The pipe connects with the sewer.
The place where a sewer , drain , or stream discharges.
sentences.cn: 卫生间的下水道堵住了.

sentences.en: The pond stank like a sewer.
sentences.cn: 池塘像阴沟一样散发着恶臭。

sentences.en: The sewer carried wastewater from a home housing one suffering from the disease.
sentences.cn: 污水沟把一家含有疾病的水带到另一家住宅.

sentences.en: The sewer lines may then become clogged with inert materials.
sentences.cn: 废水管路可能被这种惰性物质堵塞.

sentences.en: The stench from the sewer is indescribable.
sentences.cn: 下水道发出一股说不出的恶臭。

sentences.en: They are tearing up the street to repair a sewer.
sentences.cn: 他们正挖开马路修下水道.

trans.tran_cn: 阴沟，污水管，下水道，裁缝师
trans.tran_en: a pipe or passage under the ground that carries away waste material and used water from houses, factories etc

trans.tran_cn: 为…铺设污水管道；用下水道排除…的污水
